group_1.textLeft: Thanks for the help today, Himika. You@really saved me.

group_1.textRight: No, really, I should be thanking you. I was@looking for a part time job.
So I really appreciate you letting me@give you a hand.
It's a perfect way to help each other!

group_1.textLeft: *Giggle*

group_1.narration: This is Konomi Haruna.@She works part-time at a flower shop.@When they're short-staffed or need@extra help, she calls me in.

group_1.textLeft: Oh, that reminds me. Feel free to take these@home with you.

group_1.textRight: These are the flowers you showed me@earlier...
Are you sure? You're not going to sell them?

group_1.textLeft: The ones I dyed today were just samples.
[chara:303001:effect_emotion_joy_0][se:7222_happy]Plus, I want to thank you for helping me@out.

group_1.textRight: Then I gladly accept! Thank you so much.
If anything ever comes up again, be sure to@call me!

group_1.textLeft: Of course! I'll be counting on you. All@right then, be safe on your way home.

group_1.textCenter: Yeah! With these colorful flowers on@display...
Even our humble little house will look@amazing.

group_1.textLeft: Kokoro!

group_1.textRight: What's wrong? Are you looking for something?

group_1.textLeft: I was just surprised to see Masara's not@with you.

group_1.textRight: Did you buy those at the flower shop?

group_1.textLeft: They gave these to me. I'm actually on my@way home from helping out there.
What about you? Were you shopping for yarn?

group_1.textRight: Yeah, I still have some at home, but I@couldn't resist.

group_1.textLeft: Wow! What a pretty color.
Oh yeah!
I was able to knit what you taught me last@time.
But now I'm kind of stuck.
Would you mind giving me another lesson@next time you're free?

group_1.textRight: Actually, we could do it today if you're not@busy.

group_1.textLeft: Really? That'd be great! Want to come over@to my place then?
It's still cramped and noisy though.

group_1.textRight: That's what's so great about it.
I'd like to see your sisters and brothers@again, too, if you don't mind having me.

group_1.textLeft: Awesome! My brothers'll be so happy.
They're always like, "We love Kokoro,@she doesn't nag us all the time!"
Geeze, that makes it sound like I'm always@nagging them, doesn't it?

group_1.textRight: Haha, you're as close as ever I see.

group_1.textLeft: Yup! We're very fortunate.
